content: I have a request from a researcher about use of FHIR in middle and low income countries
does anyone have any information about this?
I know that FHIR was used in a small part of the ebola infrastructure. No solid information other than that. @Carl Leitner @Paul Biondich may be able to help?
John Ritter is a liaison for HL7 to middle and low income countries, it may be worth checking with him.
